name: President rock bottom: Under everything, under everyone!
name_original: President rock bottom: Under everything, under everyone!
description:
In “President rock bottom: Under everything, under everyone!”, you are the leader of a great nation, but your plans are to sink it deeper and deeper!

You have a mandate of 4 years to make the worst decisions to your country, making your rejection points skyrocket. The only problem is that it may end sooner than you expect if don’t please the four great pillars of this society: The People, The Legislative, The Private Sector and The Military.
